data.text:
If it weren't for the Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour, the cinema industry would be experiencing a very different fall season... The Eras Tour hitting the big screen demonstrates two things: 1. Just how powerful alternative content can be 2. The manifold ways cinemas can use their real estate to exercise more creative business autonomy. Find out more creative ways to drive moviegoers to your auditoriums here ðŸ‘‰ https://lnkd.in/gB_mS_Su #taylorswift #erastour #swifties #cinema #amc #movietheaters #business #entertainment #entertainmentnews #boxoffice

ESS Newsletter - The U.K. Cinema Market Q1 2024: According to the British Film Institute (BFI) "There were 28.8 million UK #cinema admissions in the first three months of 2024, 23% lower than the total for Q1 2019. The total Q1 2024 box office revenue in the UK was Â£222 million, 16% lower than for Q1 2019. The highest grossing film released during Q1 was Dune: Part Two with Â£38 million at the UK and ROI box office. One Life was the highest earning UK independent release with a gross UK and ROI box office of Â£10 million. The market share of UK independent films at the UK and ROI box office was 13.6% in Q1 2024 compared to 9.2% for Q1 2023" #leisurepropertyESS Marathon Not a Sprint to Recovery.
